banner.title: Start directly and create your email in CleverReach® now
banner.message: The import of your data is continued in the background

dashboard.title: Targeted email marketing for more revenue!

refresh.title: Error: Invalid API token
refresh.description: CleverReach® API access token is not valid anymore. In order to let system synchronize data for you, you'll have to authenticate again with CleverReach® ID: {id}. If you want to use different CleverReach® account, you need to reinstall this extension.
